entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
